head.name: Dr. Ramesh Gupta
head.description: Dr. Ramesh Gupta, the Academic Head, has over 20 years of experience in educational leadership. He is dedicated to fostering a culture of excellence and innovation in academics.

faculty.name: Dr. Asha Sharma
faculty.description: Dr. Asha Sharma has over 15 years of experience teaching advanced mathematics and mentoring students for competitive exams.

faculty.name: Mr. Rajesh Kumar
faculty.description: Mr. Rajesh Kumar specializes in Physics and Chemistry, focusing on hands-on experiments and research-based learning.

faculty.name: Ms. Priya Verma
faculty.description: Ms. Priya Verma is an expert in English literature and language, fostering critical thinking and communication skills.

faculty.name: Mrs. Kavita Singh
faculty.description: Mrs. Kavita Singh brings history and geography to life with her engaging teaching methods and interactive lessons.

activities.name: Art & Craft
activities.description: Encouraging creativity and self-expression through various art and craft activities.

activities.name: Music & Dance
activities.description: Providing opportunities to learn and perform music and dance, fostering cultural appreciation.

activities.name: Drama Club
activities.description: Developing confidence and communication skills through theatrical performances.

activities.name: Debate & Public Speaking
activities.description: Enhancing critical thinking and communication skills through debates and public speaking events.

sports.name: Cricket
sports.description: Our cricket team participates in inter-school tournaments and fosters teamwork and discipline.

sports.name: Football
sports.description: Football coaching and matches to promote physical fitness and team spirit.

sports.name: Basketball
sports.description: Basketball training sessions and competitions to develop agility and coordination.

sports.name: Athletics
sports.description: Track and field events to encourage overall physical development and sportsmanship.
